subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ general manager and hitting coach said they wanted to ensure Ike Davis and Lucas Duda, who were both injured soon after the start of spring training, were fully comfortable before coming back.
snippet: The Mets’ general manager and hitting coach said they wanted to ensure Ike Davis and Lucas Duda, who were both injured soon after the start of spring training, were fully comfortable before coming back.
